feed.title: Hulman Lab
feed.subtitle: An engaging 1-3 sentence description of your lab.

entry.title: Launching our website and newsletter
entry.content: It is important for us to launch a website and a newsletter, because we’d like to extend our communication beyond publishing scientific articles and presenting at conferences. We will use these channels to give a better picture of who we are, what projects we work on, and our activities (e.g. workshops, seminars, journal clubs, patient involment sessions).
entry.summary: It is important for us to launch a website and a newsletter, because we’d like to extend our communication beyond publishing scientific articles and presenting at conferences. We will use these channels to give a better picture of who we are, what projects we work on, and our activities (e.g. workshops, seminars, journal clubs, patient involment sessions).
